column1: Funeral services will be held at 11:00 a.m.
column4: 2015 at Jesup Church of God with Pastor Clayton Dowd and Rev. David Leggett officiating along with American Legion Post 311 presenting the American Flag. Interment will be in Pinecrest Memorial Cemetery. Visitation will be held from 4:00 to 6:00 p.m.
column7: 2015 at Rinehart and Sons Funeral Home.
